intro.description: This test requires org.eclipse.ua.tests to be installed

item.title: Find filtered topics
item.description: Test that topics and subtopics can be filtered.

subitem.label: Launch Help by selecting Help->Help Contents from the menu. You should see a book called "tests" in the bookshelf.
Open the topic "filter" in the book "tests".
Check that there are two subtopics "The plugin org.eclipse.help is installed"
Check that there are two subtopics "This topic should always appear"
Check that there are two subtopics "The product org.eclipse.sdk.ide is running"
Check that there are two subtopics "The activity org.eclipse.javaDevelopment is enabled"
Check that there are two subtopics "The category org.eclipse.categories.developmentCategory is enabled"
Check there are no subtopics with "invalid" in the title
Check that there is a line "The plugin org.eclipse.help is installed" in both the Enablement and Legacy sections.
Check that there is a line "The product org.eclipse.sdk.ide is running" in both the Enablement and Legacy sections.
Check that there is a line "The activity org.eclipse.javaDevelopment is enabled" in both the Enablement and Legacy sections.
Check that there a line "The category org.eclipse.categories.developmentCategory is enabled" in both the Enablement and Legacy sections.
Check there is no line containing the word with "invalid"

item.title: Search for word in xhtml page
item.description: Search for "plugin invalid is installed". Verify that Dynamic Content (potential hit) shows at or near the top of the search hits.
